attributes.action: Create the United Kingdom Home Guard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I lived abroad, namely Spain almost 3 years ago, this was for 3 years I lived in an extremely safe environment.
I feel this is due to the Guardia Civil,translated the spanish civil guard.
This initiative has created employment for several individuals including training for school leavers.This provides the communities with a safer environment.Here in the U.K. we could have similar with our British army or 'Home Guard working alongside the Police providing employment and securing our homes and country against all current issues such as Terrorism.
